title: Understanding the Home Tab
text: The Home tab in Excel contains various options for formatting cells, including font styles, alignment, and colors.

title: Locating the Fill Color Option
text: The Fill Color option is located in the Font group on the Home tab. It allows you to change the background color of selected cells.

hintAnswer: select the desired range, then select the Fill Color arrow (Home tab, Font group)
title: Steps to Change Background Color
text: To change the background color of a cell, first select the desired range of cells.
choices: select the desired range, then select the Fill Color arrow (Home tab, Font group)
select the desired range, then the desired color
select the desired range, then select the Color arrow
